hero.title: Craft a <highlight>professional resume</highlight> that lands interviews
hero.description: Our intuitive resume builder helps you create a perfectly formatted, ATS-friendly resume that showcases your skills and experience.

company.title: Create resumes that help you land jobs at top companies

features.title: Everything you need to create the perfect resume
features.description: Our resume builder combines beautiful design with powerful features to help you create a resume that stands out.

feature1.title: Easy Customization
feature1.description: Customize every aspect of your resume with our intuitive, drag-and-drop editor.

feature2.title: Real-time Preview
feature2.description: See changes to your resume in real-time as you make them.

feature3.title: Multiple Formats
feature3.description: Export your resume in PDF, DOCX, or TXT formats for different application requirements.

feature4.title: ATS Optimization
feature4.description: Our templates are designed to pass Applicant Tracking Systems with ease.

feature5.title: AI Suggestions
feature5.description: Get smart content suggestions to improve your resume and stand out.

feature6.title: Professional Templates
feature6.description: Choose from a variety of ATS-friendly resume templates designed by professionals.

use.heading: Three steps to your perfect resume
use.subheading: Creating a professional resume has never been easier

steps.title: Choose a Template
steps.description: Select from our professionally designed templates that are optimized for ATS systems.

steps.title: Add Your Content
steps.description: Fill in your information using our intuitive editor with helpful suggestions.

steps.title: Download & Apply
steps.description: Export your resume in your preferred format and start applying for jobs immediately.

team.title: The creators behind LaResume

testimonial.title: What our users are saying

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Everything you need to create professional resumes - completely free

card.title: Free
card.sentence: Compare with other resume builders: ❌ $15/mo • ❌ Ads • ❌ Limited Templates

random.title: Proudly open source
random.heading: Ready to Elevate Your Career?
random.description: Join thousands of professionals who have transformed their job search

question1.question: Is La-Resume really completely free?
question1.answer: Yes! La-Resume is 100% free and open source. We believe professional resume building should be accessible to everyone.

question2.question: How does the ATS optimization work?
question2.answer: Our templates follow industry best practices for ATS compatibility, including proper keyword placement, clean formatting, and semantic structure.

question3.question: Can I use my own LaTeX templates?
question3.answer: Currently we support our curated templates, but we plan to add custom template support in future updates.

deleteModal.title: Confirm Delete
